resources.string: Access control made simple and secure.
Use mobile controls or facial recognition with fingerprint to open doors remotely. No need for keys!
Enjoy seamless access and better security. Control all your doors from your phone, anytime, anywhere.
Keep your digital door and data safe. Always in sync, always in control.
Manage access, monitor activity, and personalize everything from your phone.
It\'s fast, simple, and made just for you. Let\'s sync things up!

Thesis project designed to revolutionize access control in condominiums by integrating modern technologies with centralized management. The system features a Raspberry Pi 5 as the core, syncing mobile, web, and desktop platforms for seamless door management and access tracking.
